text: Di madagoaa di King Zedekiah mo dana llongo dauwa ga gidee nia mee ala guu hai, digaula gaa hula gaa llele gi daha mo di waahale i di boo. Digaula gaa llele i di ala dela e hana i lodo di hadagee o di king, gaa hana i di ala dela e duudagi i mehanga nia abaaba e lua, gaa hana gi di gowaa mehanga gonduu o Jordan.
